title: Saubhagya Food Bank
description: A volunteer-run food bank serving over 200 families weekly with dry ration kits and cooked meal distribution. Operates from a donated warehouse space near Bopal Bridge with cold storage for perishable donations.

title: Bopal Community Clinic
description: Free OPD clinic run by retired doctors offering basic diagnostics, blood pressure monitoring, diabetes screening, and prescription assistance. Open Monday to Saturday, 9 AM to 1 PM.

title: FitZone Gym Bopal
description: Affordable community fitness center with cardio machines, free weights, and group yoga sessions. Monthly membership starts at ₹500. Separate timings for women available on request.

title: QuickPrint Xerox Center
description: Reliable photocopy and print shop offering black & white and color printing, lamination, spiral binding, and passport-size photo services. Competitive rates for bulk student projects.

title: Bopal Children's Playground
description: Well-maintained municipal playground with swings, slides, and a small open-air reading nook stocked with children's books donated by the Bopal Residents Association.

title: Balaji Puncture & Tyre Shop
description: Quick roadside puncture repair for two-wheelers and four-wheelers. Also stocks basic tyre sizes for emergency replacements. Open 7 AM to 10 PM daily including Sundays.

title: BPCL Petrol Pump Bopal
description: Full-service fuel station with petrol, diesel, and air-filling facilities. Accepts all digital payment modes. Clean restroom facilities available for travellers on the SP Ring Road.

title: Civic Center Bopal
description: AMC civic service center providing birth/death certificates, property tax payments, water connection applications, and Aadhar enrollment services. Token-based queue system.

title: Saraswati Library Bopal
description: Community lending library with a collection of over 8,000 books in Gujarati, Hindi, and English. Has a dedicated children's section and a quiet study hall for competitive exam preparation.

title: Sahara Food Distribution
description: Daily cooked meal distribution point serving lunch to migrant workers and daily-wage laborers. Funded through community donations and corporate CSR partnerships.

title: Satellite Health Center
description: Government-aided primary health center offering immunization, prenatal checkups, and general medicine consultations. Staff includes two MBBS doctors and four ANM nurses.

title: Satellite Book House
description: Private lending library and bookshop with curated collections for UPSC, GPSC, and banking exam aspirants. Also stocks popular fiction, magazines, and daily newspapers.

title: Iron Pump Gym
description: No-frills strength training gym with heavy-duty squat racks, Olympic platforms, and dumbbells up to 50 kg. Popular among powerlifting enthusiasts. Personal training available.

title: Speedy Xerox Satellite
description: Fast turnaround document center near multiple coaching institutes. Specializes in bulk photocopying of study materials, thesis printing, and hardbound project submissions.

title: Satellite Garden Park
description: Landscaped neighborhood park with walking tracks, an outdoor gym area, and a small community bookshelf near the entrance. Morning yoga sessions conducted by volunteer instructors.

title: Fast Fix Puncture Satellite
description: Trusted neighborhood tyre repair shop known for quick tubeless puncture fixes and wheel balancing services. Stocks tubes and tyres for Honda, TVS, and Bajaj two-wheelers.

title: IOCL Satellite Pump
description: Indian Oil fuel station conveniently located near the Satellite flyover. Offers calibrated dispensers, free air, and a small convenience store. Paytm and Google Pay accepted.

title: Annapurna Trust Food Bank
description: Non-profit food redistribution center that collects surplus food from restaurants, catering events, and weddings, then distributes it to underserved communities same-day.

title: AMC Ward Office Satellite
description: Municipal ward office handling property tax queries, building permissions, trade licenses, and public grievance registration. Walk-in hours: 10:30 AM to 5:30 PM, Mon-Sat.

title: Digital Print Hub Satellite
description: Modern digital printing center with wide-format banner printing, visiting card design, flex signage, and same-day delivery for urgent document orders.

title: Thaltej Free Clinic
description: Free medical clinic operated by a charitable trust with weekly specialist camps for ophthalmology and orthopedics. Medicines dispensed at no cost from an in-house pharmacy.

title: Vidyanagar Library Thaltej
description: Well-stocked public library featuring a digital section with e-book readers, a children's activity corner, and free Wi-Fi. Annual membership is ₹200 with a refundable deposit.

title: PowerFit Gym Thaltej
description: Modern gym facility with functional training zone, Zumba studio, and steam room. Certified trainers provide personalized diet plans. Early bird 6 AM batch available.

title: Copy Corner Thaltej
description: Reliable neighborhood xerox shop with scanning, fax, and notary stamp services. Located near multiple schools, making it popular for last-minute project printouts.

title: Thaltej Green Park
description: Expansive green space along SG Highway with jogging tracks, an amphitheater for community events, and a small botanical garden maintained by the forest department.

title: Balaji Tyre Works Thaltej
description: Full-service tyre shop offering puncture repair, wheel alignment, nitrogen filling, and seasonal tyre swaps. Known for honest pricing and quick turnaround.

title: HP Fuel Station Thaltej
description: Hindustan Petroleum fuel station with automated dispensers, 24/7 operation, car wash facility, and a small snack counter for highway commuters.

title: Seva Trust Food Distribution
description: Community-driven food distribution initiative providing breakfast and dinner packets to homeless individuals near Thaltej Tekra. Volunteers welcome on weekends.

title: AMC Health Center Thaltej
description: AMC-run urban health center providing vaccination drives, sanitation awareness campaigns, and basic first-aid services. Houses the local mosquito control and dengue prevention unit.

title: MuscleFlex CrossFit Thaltej
description: High-energy CrossFit box with Olympic lifting platforms, assault bikes, rowers, and daily programmed WODs. Beginner-friendly foundations course runs every month.

title: SG Highway Public Library
address: Near Iscon Mega Mall, SG Highway
description: Air-conditioned public reading room with over 12,000 titles across academic, self-help, and regional literature. Has a dedicated section for visually impaired readers with Braille books.

title: SG Health Clinic
description: Walk-in health clinic offering free blood sugar testing, ECG, and basic pathology. Run by the Rotary Club of Ahmedabad with doctors volunteering on rotating schedules.

title: CrossFit Arena SG
description: Premium CrossFit and calisthenics studio with outdoor training area and obstacle course. Hosts monthly community fitness challenges and charity workout events.

title: Express Print SG Highway
description: High-speed commercial printing center specializing in corporate presentations, architectural blueprints, and marketing collateral. Same-hour turnaround for standard jobs.

title: SG Highway Garden
description: Peaceful urban garden with medicinal plant trails, a butterfly zone, and evening cultural program space. Maintained by a residents' welfare association with dedicated gardening staff.

title: Road King Puncture SG
description: 24-hour roadside puncture repair service catering to SG Highway commuters. Also offers mobile tyre assistance — call them and they come to your location within 30 minutes.

title: Reliance Petro Pump SG
description: High-throughput Reliance fuel station with multiple lanes to minimize wait time. Features a Jio digital payment kiosk, clean washrooms, and a small food stall.

title: Roti Bank SG Highway
description: Daily roti and sabzi distribution to construction workers and auto-rickshaw drivers near Vaishnodevi Circle. Entirely funded by neighborhood donors with transparent accounting.

title: Ward Office SG Highway
description: AMC ward office serving the SG Highway corridor. Handles road maintenance complaints, streetlight issues, water supply disruptions, and garbage collection schedules.

title: Planet Fitness SG
address: Near Titanium City Center, SG Highway
description: Spacious fitness center spread over 3,000 sq ft with dedicated zones for strength, cardio, and flexibility training. Offers complimentary fitness assessments for new members.

title: Maninagar Free Clinic
description: Charitable dispensary near the Maninagar railway station providing free medicines and doctor consultations for railway workers and nearby slum residents. Open 8 AM to 2 PM.

title: Maninagar Public Library
description: One of the oldest lending libraries in East Ahmedabad with a rich Gujarati literature collection. Hosts monthly book discussion circles and poetry recitation evenings.

title: Shakti Gym Maninagar
description: Budget-friendly gym popular among local youth offering basic weight training equipment, a small cardio section, and evening martial arts classes. Monthly fee: ₹400.

title: Rapid Xerox Maninagar
description: Go-to xerox shop for Maninagar's student community offering discount rates on bulk copying. Also provides resume formatting, cover letter typing, and email printing services.

title: Maninagar Garden Park
description: Municipal garden with mature neem and banyan trees, a children's play area, and a small community library corner with donated books. Evening walking track lit with solar lamps.

title: Lucky Puncture Shop Maninagar
description: Well-known tyre repair shop on Maninagar Main Road with over 15 years of experience. Handles everything from scooter punctures to SUV tyre replacements at fair prices.

title: Shell Fuel Maninagar
description: Shell-branded fuel station with V-Power premium fuel option, nitrogen tyre inflation, and a well-stocked convenience store. Located at the base of the Maninagar flyover.

title: Daan Patra Food Bank
description: Food collection bin initiative where community members drop off packaged food items. Collected daily and distributed to orphanages, old-age homes, and night shelters across the city.

title: AMC Zone Office Maninagar
description: Zonal administrative office managing civic services for the entireeast Ahmedabad belt. Offers RTI filing, building plan approvals, and trade license renewals.

title: SmartPrint Maninagar
description: Digital print shop with graphic design services for wedding cards, pamphlets, and banners. Also offers PVC ID card printing and document attestation support.

title: Chandkheda Charity Clinic
description: Free weekly health camp with visiting specialists in dermatology and pediatrics. Blood donation drives organized quarterly in partnership with the Red Cross Society.

title: Chandkheda Reading Room
description: Quiet study space popular with engineering and pharmacy students from nearby colleges. Air-conditioned reading hall with current affairs magazines and competitive exam guides.

title: Flex Fitness Chandkheda
description: Well-equipped fitness center with modern Smith machines, cable crossover stations, and a dedicated functional training area. Ladies-only morning batch from 7 to 9 AM.

title: PrintAll Chandkheda
description: Affordable all-in-one print shop serving the student community with xerox at ₹0.50 per page, color printing, thesis binding, and online document download assistance.

title: Chandkheda Nature Park
description: Eco-friendly park with native plant species garden, bird-watching zone, and an open-air stage for weekend cultural activities. Free entry, open sunrise to sunset.

title: Raj Tyre House Chandkheda
description: Authorized MRF and CEAT tyre dealer alongside standard puncture repair services. Wheel alignment computerized system available for cars and SUVs.

title: BPCL Pump Chandkheda
description: Bharat Petroleum station on the busy Chandkheda bypass with quick-fill lanes, ATM machine on premises, and a small vehicle accessory shop.

title: Jan Kalyan Food Trust
description: Weekly ration distribution serving 150+ families with essential grocery items including rice, wheat, oil, and spices. Registration required through local anganwadi worker.

title: Chandkheda Civic Center
description: Integrated citizen service center providing Aadhaar updates, voter ID registration, PAN card applications, and senior citizen certificate issuance under one roof.

title: PowerHouse Gym Chandkheda
description: Intensity-focused gym with heavy bag boxing area, battle ropes, and prowler sled track. Known for its high-energy atmosphere and competitive monthly transformation challenges.

title: Gota Community Clinic
description: Community health center offering free dental checkups on Wednesdays and general physician consultation daily. Supported by local doctors' association and pharmaceutical company donations.

title: Gota Public Library
description: Modern public library with touchscreen catalogue system, 10 computer terminals with internet access, and a dedicated kids' storytelling area on Saturday mornings.

title: StrongArm Gym Gota
description: Bodybuilding-focused gym with competition-grade equipment, posing mirrors, and supplement consultation. Has produced multiple state-level physique competition winners.

title: FastCopy Gota
description: Speed-focused document center with three high-speed copiers ensuring minimal wait times. Offers document scanning to USB, cloud upload assistance, and same-day courier services.

title: Gota Urban Park
description: Newly developed urban park with synthetic jogging track, outdoor gym equipment, skate park, and a community herb garden. Evening food stalls on weekends attract family crowds.

title: Laxmi Puncture House Gota
description: Family-run tyre repair business for over 20 years. Known for honest assessments — they'll patch it if it's fixable instead of pushing a new tube. Emergency roadside service available.

title: IOCL Pump Gota
description: Indian Oil station at the Gota SP Ring Road junction with 6 dispensing lanes, digital payment kiosks, windshield cleaning service, and a small cafeteria with masala chai.

title: Seva Mandir Food Trust
description: Temple-run food distribution program serving free thali meals to anyone who visits between 11 AM and 1 PM daily. No registration or identification required.

title: AMC Zone Office Gota
description: Zonal AMC office handling building permissions, NOCs, drainage complaints, and new water connection requests for Gota, Jagatpur, and surrounding areas.

title: FitLife Gym Gota
description: Family-friendly fitness center with separate cardio and weight zones, TRX suspension training, and a kids' activity section so parents can work out worry-free.

title: Paldi Free Dispensary
description: Historic charitable dispensary operating since 1962. Provides free allopathic and ayurvedic treatment, along with heavily subsidized diagnostic tests for BPL card holders.

title: Paldi Municipal Library
description: Heritage-era library building with a comprehensive Gujarati and Sanskrit manuscript collection. Houses a research wing used by doctoral students from Gujarat University.

title: Fitness Hub Paldi
description: Compact but well-maintained neighborhood gym with essential equipment for strength training and conditioning. Offers discounted rates for students with valid college ID.

title: PhotoCopy Center Paldi
description: Old-school xerox center trusted by law firms and CA offices in the area. Specializes in legal document copying, court filing preparation, and attested copy services.

title: Paldi Garden Playground
description: Neighborhood garden with heritage trees, a gazebo for senior citizens, and a fenced children's playground with rubber flooring. Open 5:30 AM to 9:30 PM.

title: Suresh Puncture Paldi
description: Veteran tyre mechanic serving the Paldi area for 25+ years. Specializes in vintage car tyre sourcing and classic motorcycle tube repairs alongside regular puncture services.

title: HP Pump Paldi
address: Near Sardar Patel Ring Road, Paldi
description: HP fuel station on the busy Paldi junction. Features automated fuel dispensers, free air and water for vehicles, and accepts fleet cards for commercial vehicle operators.

title: Akshay Patra Paldi
description: Part of the Akshaya Patra Foundation network, this kitchen prepares and delivers mid-day meals to over 40 municipal schools in the Paldi-Vasna belt daily.

title: AMC Ward Office Paldi
description: Full-service municipal ward office for birth/death registration, senior citizen cards, widow pension applications, and shopkeeper license renewals. Complaint helpline active 24/7.

title: GymNation Paldi
description: 24-hour access gym with biometric entry for members. Features Hammer Strength equipment, spin cycling studio, and a recovery lounge with foam rollers and stretching mats.

title: Vastrapur Free Health Camp
description: Monthly free health camp organized at the Vastrapur Lake community hall with blood tests, eye checkups, and specialist consultations. Pre-registration via WhatsApp recommended.

title: Vastrapur Digital Library
description: Tech-forward library with tablet lending program, audiobook stations, and a maker space with 3D printer access. Collaborates with IIM Ahmedabad for occasional lecture screenings.

title: Vastrapur All Sports Gym
description: Multi-discipline fitness center with indoor badminton courts, a boxing ring, and a heated swimming pool. Annual membership includes access to all facilities and group classes.

title: SuperPrint Vastrapur
description: One-stop print solution near BRTS station catering to MBA and PhD students from IIMA and nearby institutes. Offers research paper formatting, citation checks, and thesis printing.

title: Vastrapur Lakeside Walk
description: Scenic lakeside walking path with distance markers, meditation zones, and a floating book exchange library on a pontoon. Regular birdwatching events organized by nature enthusiasts.

title: Shree Puncture Works Vastrapur
description: Conveniently located on the 132 ft ring road for quick on-the-go repairs. Stocks run-flat tyre patches and offers nitrogen inflation for performance vehicles.

title: BPCL Vastrapur Pump
description: BPCL station near ISB campus with Speed fuel and regular options. Has a Pure for Sure certification, automated billing, and a gated parking area for quick stops.

title: Bhojan Shala Trust
description: Traditional Gujarati bhojan shala (dining hall) offering free vegetarian meals twice daily. Funded by a Jain charitable trust with a legacy of over 50 years of service.

title: AMC Health Post Vastrapur
description: Primary urban health post providing immunization, family planning consultation, nutrition counseling for pregnant women, and seasonal disease prevention awareness programs.

title: V-Fit Studio Vastrapur
description: Boutique fitness studio popular with IIM students and faculty. Offers HIIT, pilates, and yoga fusion classes in small batches of 12 for personalized attention.

title: Ashram Road Free Clinic
address: Near Income Tax Circle, Ashram Road
description: Walk-in clinic offering free health screenings and referral services to government hospitals. Staffed by medical volunteers from B.J. Medical College on rotating schedules.

title: Gandhi Ashram Library
description: Heritage library within the Sabarmati Ashram complex housing Gandhiji's personal correspondence, rare independence-era publications, and a peace studies research archive.

title: Elite Fitness Ashram Road
description: Premium fitness club with AC training floor, boxing studio, and rooftop yoga deck overlooking the Sabarmati riverfront. Offers corporate wellness programs for nearby offices.

title: DocuPrint Ashram Road
description: Professional print and document management center used by lawyers, journalists, and publishers. Offers book publishing support, ISBN registration guidance, and bulk printing.

title: Riverfront Heritage Park
description: Part of the iconic Sabarmati Riverfront development with a 1.5 km promenade, event lawns, flower gardens, and an open-air reading zone with panoramic river views.

title: Highway Puncture Shop
description: Strategic roadside repair shop serving the heavy traffic corridor of Ashram Road. Expert at handling commercial vehicle tyres and offers emergency jump-start services.

title: Essar Fuel Ashram Road
description: Nayara Energy (formerly Essar) fuel station with high-flow dispensers for trucks and buses. Features a dedicated CNG lane, digital payment terminals, and 24-hour security.

title: Shree Ann Food Foundation
description: Non-profit foundation that organizes community kitchens during festivals and natural disasters. Maintains a permanent food pantry accessible to registered beneficiaries year-round.

title: AMC Heritage Center Ashram Rd
description: AMC heritage and tourism information center with city walking tour bookings, historical site maps, and permit issuance for photography at protected monuments.

title: FitWell Club Ashram Road
description: University-adjacent fitness club offering student discount memberships. Well-maintained swimming pool, sauna, and a well-stocked juice bar with protein shake options.

title: Navrangpura Reading Room
description: Popular study hall opposite HL College with extended hours until 11 PM during exam season. Provides lockers, charging points, and affordable canteen meals for students.

title: Navrangpura Wellness Clinic
description: Holistic wellness center offering free yoga therapy sessions, naturopathy consultations, and acupressure treatments. Evening batch devoted to stress management for working professionals.

title: Crossfit Navrangpura
description: Compact CrossFit box with rope climbs, plyo boxes, and kettlebell stations. Known for its tight-knit community vibe and post-WOD chai sessions. Drop-ins welcome.

title: QuickPrint CG Road
description: Strategically located print shop on CG Road serving nearby offices and the Municipal Market. Offers visiting card design, rubber stamp making, and notarized copy services.

title: Law Garden Open Library
description: Famous open-air evening market turned community reading space during mornings. Volunteers curate rotating book collections on benches under the iconic banyan trees.

title: Auto Puncture Navrangpura
description: Well-established puncture and tyre shop near the university gate. Popular with students for affordable scooty and bicycle tyre repairs. Also sells second-hand tyres.

title: IOCL CG Road Pump
description: Centrally located Indian Oil station on CG Road with calibrated dispensers, complimentary windshield cleaning, and a loyalty points program for regular customers.

title: Sahbhagi Roti Bank
description: Roti collection and redistribution network with drop-off points at 15 locations across Navrangpura. Leftover rotis from households are collected and distributed to night shelters.

title: AMC Zone Office Navrangpura
description: Busy AMC zone office managing urban planning, encroachment removal, fire safety NOCs, and commercial establishment licensing for the Navrangpura-CG Road-Stadium area.

title: FitPro Gym Navrangpura
description: Neighborhood gym near Parimal Garden with morning outdoor bootcamp sessions in the garden itself. Indoor facility includes Cybex machines, stretching area, and steam bath.

title: Ellisbridge Seva Clinic
description: Historic charity clinic serving the walled city area since 1978. Offers free eye testing, dental scaling, and general physician services. Medicines provided from an attached pharmacy.

title: Ellisbridge Community Gym
description: Heritage-area community gym housed in a renovated municipal building. Basic but clean equipment with focus on senior citizen fitness programs and physiotherapy exercises.

title: Copy World Ellisbridge
description: Hospital-adjacent document center specializing in medical record photocopying, insurance claim form printing, and discharge summary duplicates. Sensitive document handling guaranteed.

title: Victoria Garden Park
description: Historic Victorian-era garden with ornamental fountains, a small zoo section with birds, and a heritage library wing displaying rare manuscripts from the British Raj period.

title: Om Puncture Ellisbridge
description: Tiny but efficient puncture repair stall on Relief Road handling the area's heavy two-wheeler traffic. Known for 10-minute flat fixes and honest tube condition assessments.

title: BPCL Pump Ellisbridge
description: Heritage-area BPCL station with classic art deco canopy design. Offers standard and premium fuel grades, engine oil top-up service, and battery water refill facility.

title: Gandhi Roti Centre
description: Free roti distribution center near the historic Bhadra Fort area, serving the old city's working poor. Operates daily from 12 PM to 2 PM with additional evening service on weekdays.

title: Ellisbridge Heritage Center
description: Combined civic and heritage conservation office managing protected monument maintenance, heritage walk permits, and architectural restoration approvals for the Ellisbridge precinct.

title: EliteFit Studio Ellisbridge
description: Boutique fitness studio in a converted haveli near Teen Darwaza. Offers pilates reformer classes, aerial yoga, and barre workouts in a beautifully restored heritage setting.

title: Sardar Nagar Mobile Library
description: Innovative mobile library van that parks near Sardar Patel Stadium on weekday evenings and visits 5 other neighborhoods on a rotating schedule. Free book borrowing with Aadhaar ID.
